pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Interface to the ROPTLIB Library for Riemannian Manifold Optimization // An R interface to the 'ROPTLIB' optimization library (see http://www.math.fsu.edu/~whuang2 for more information). Optimize real-valued functions over manifolds such as Stiefel, Grassmann, and Symmetric Positive Definite matrices.
